Milestone.milestoneText: Set the restrict change permission only to Betsy Allan, to quarterly sales.xlsx.

guidedStep.guidedText: Click the Office button and choose Prepare→Restrict Permission→Manage Credentials.
In the Select User dialog box, verify that your user account is displayed and click OK.
In the Permission dialog box, check the Restrict Permission To This Workbook check box.
In the Change text box, type betsyallan@xchg.com to grant change permission to the manager.

Milestone.milestoneText: Set an expiration date for the workbook.

guidedStep.guidedText: In the Permission dialog box, click More Options to display advanced permission options.
In the Additional Permissions For Users section, check the This Workbook Expires On check box.
In the This Workbook Expires On text box, triple-click and type 5/6/2007 to set the expiration date and click OK.
